title: The Final Act
description: Issy and James have come a long way since that fateful first audition. And now filming is finally underway, past dangers seem behind them. But when a deadly character from the past makes a reappearance, their relationship will be tested to the limits. And Issy is about to find out, that fame and love donâ€™t always mix. Could this be the end of everything?
author: J.S.  Taylor
